REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1668 reute r f BC-WEBCOR-<WER>-TO-BE-DE 04-03 0052

TEXT.TITLE: WEBCOR <WER> TO BE DELISTED
TEXT.BODY: Webcor Electronics Inc said April 8 will be the last day for its stock to be traded on the American Stock Exchange due to its failure to meet the financial guidelines. It said it is exploring the possibility of listing its stock on another exchange. Reuter
